chunk:

Brand: Sephora

Category: Toners/Astringents

chunk: Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Polysorbate 20, Propanediol, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Glycerin, Arginine, Maris Aqua (Sea Water), Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Citrate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Levulinic Acid, Citric Acid, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Xanthan Gum
book: 2180-Sephora Collection Ultra Glow Toner With Vitamins C + E

chunk: Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
